title: 3.3 Master Challenge 2
question: Modify the Food Chain game to include the plant sprites as well. As the main sprite is a carnivorous animal, it should not eat plants. The main sprite should prey upon only animals. The game should end if it touches any plants.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
